</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns if sides are friendly or hostile. For a value smaller than 0.6 it results in being enemy, otherwise it is friendly. See also [[Side relations]].</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> side1 '''getFriend''' side2 </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side1: [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> side2: [[Side]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - Decimal value between 0.0 to 1.0 </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>value <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[west]] [[getFriend]] [[east]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isEnemy <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[side]] _killer [[getFriend]] [[side]] _victim < 0.6;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
